sort.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a group or class of people, things etc that have similar qualities or features
sort.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Most of the victims developed psychological problems of one sort or another (=of various different types).
They do burgers, pizzas, that sort of thing.
I like all sorts of food – I’m not fussy.
He wondered if Rosa was in some sort of trouble.
of some sort/some sort of something
There was a game of some sort going on inside.
of some sort/some sort of something
What sort of shampoo do you use?
On expeditions of this sort, you have to be prepared for trouble.
sort.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who has a particular type of character, and is therefore likely to behave in a particular way
sort.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Iain’s never even looked at another woman. He’s not the sort.
sort.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: if a computer does a sort, it puts things in a particular order
sort.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: We must ensure that this sort of thing does not happen again.
There has been some sort of error.
We had the same sort of background.
It’s a similar sort of house.
Barbara never stopped wanting a different sort of life.
Wearing the right sort of clothing could save your life.
What other sorts of books do you like?
He collects all sorts of musical instruments.
Quite a large number of them suffered injuries of one sort or another.
sort.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to put things in a particular order or arrange them in groups according to size, type etc
sort.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The eggs are sorted according to size.
Let’s sort all the clothes into piles.
All the names on the list have been sorted into alphabetical order.
sort.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to deal with a situation so that all the problems are solved and everything is organized
sort.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Right, I’ll leave this for Roger and Terry to sort, then.
sort.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: if a computer does a sort, it puts things in a particular order
sort.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: If you do a sort on the computer, it will list entries in alphabetical order.
